archimate:TechnologyFunction.documentation:
API Monitoring
• Purpose: Comprehensive observability for API performance and health • Metrics: Response times, error rates, throughput, availability, security events • Features: Real-time alerting, SLA monitoring, trend analysis, anomaly detection • Tools: Application performance monitoring (APM), log aggregation, custom dashboards • Benefits: Proactive issue detection, performance optimization, compliance reporting
